Course-name: Constitution of India and Environmental Governance: Administrative and Adjudicatory Process
Course-instructor:
Prof. Sairam Bhat
Prof. M. K. Ramesh
Institute-name: National Law School of India University
content: This course will delve into the rationale behind the emergence and the growing jurisprudence of Environmental Law. By looking into various legislations and decisions by courts of law, this course aims to put across the myriad ways in which Environmental Laws work.
